outputs.output_descr:
This EU/FMO support to the Government of St. Vincent funded assistance will include training and other CARTAC technical assistance areas earmarked and prioritized by the Government of St. Vincent and the Grenadines, following the March 2009 assessment mission. This EU/FMO assistance will be implemented by the Ministry of Finance which has direct oversight for Public Finance Management (PFM) and related PEFA programme components. These include:

• A Public Finance Management (PFM) Reform Programme which is in line with the requirements of the FMO. This PFM programme was formulated with an Action Plan to improve Public Finance Management activities. 

• A Government established Public Finance Management Reform Steering Committee which will facilitate the implementation of the PFM Programme and   will be responsible for ensuring the successful implementation and outcomes of the PFM reform programme.  

• A PFM working group established to support the development of the PFM Reform Action Plan with components such as the market-valuation based property tax system; the new budgeting tools introduced under the CIDA funded Eastern Caribbean Economic Management Project (ECEMP); Legal and regulatory reforms inclusive of the Procurement and Contract Administration Act; Monitoring change management and capacity building in the public service.
